TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Malaysia, title = Malaysia, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malaysia} }

S.FORM: = Malaysia = Gaga kska Yacow ka Malaysia, 2 30 N, 112 30 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 330,803 sq km(hangan na o Tg67) (knlbanga dxgal o 329,613 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 1,190 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 30,949,962 hiyi. Gaga Kuala Lumpur ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 31 idas 8 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Malaysia ga wada sugan 23.20% ka dxgal qpahan, 62% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 14.80% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Yang di-Pertuan Agong, pnaah hngkawas2016 idas 12 jiyax 31pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Malaysia Malaysia (Skari Malaysia, Eygo: Malaysia; lxan splawa ka Tama) kiya ka qnlhangan wa mniq Tunarac hunac Asia. Snpeyyah brah Malaysia Ryeynpang, Tudaya Poroco, Sarawey mi Singapore u mniq kngkawas 1963 idas 9 diyax 16 pnspuwan ka pnwaya ryeynpang, pnwaya gikay mincu, seyngkyo pnwaya cyuncu mi qnlhangan pnwaya cyuncu phiyu keyngpo, hiti daw Singapore co u mniq kngkawas 1965 idas 8 diyax 9 cida u wada plixan hangan ryeynpang, kiya u wada murux dukuricu phiyu qnlhangan. Weynso qnlhangan Malaysia ka splawa dha knbaraw bay weynso, snpeyyah pnrngawan Malay mpqlahang muda umau. Kiya mi seyhu u snpeyyah mnngal knou bay kokoingkay giying na cngtang mi bukung ryeynmong-congri ka mpdudul niya, seyji ticu u muru snpeyyah Ingkoku pnwaya simin. Quri so waycyaw u, Malaysia ka UN kaying, kiya uri u Hwan Induyang Cyuyu Hcwo Ryeynmong, Pnsliyan Asia Taypingyang Keyjay Hecwo, Ta Ing Kwosyey, Tunarac Hunac Asia Qnlhangan Syeyhuy, Ini Pwaluk Undo mi Pnsliyan Islam Huyyi na qnlhangan ntumal, kiya u Tunarac Hunac Asia Qnlhangan Syeyhuy mi Pnsliyan Islam kaygi na pnrdingan smmalu phiyu qnlhangan uri. Mnuda qpahun Tunarac Hunac Qnlhangan Syeyhuy, Pnsliyan Islam kaygi mi Ini Pwaluk Undo cusi, mnuda qpahun UN Anrihuy huycangjn riji qnhlangan. Ri-s Scyeyn sci mi wangcaw cbiyaw Rudah bay cbiyaw mnniq dxral nniqan hini ka sediq pa malau bhrawan smpu dhuq 4 knbkiyan brah cida. Tubrah balay mnniq Malay Pantaw na sediq pa sediq Nikrito, splawa dha llbu sediq qalux. Rudan cbiyaw sediq Indu splawa dha 'King Pataw' (Ji Indu: Suvarnadvipa; Eygo: Golden Peninsula) ka Malay Pataw. Mniq kcka juga qnlangan Ptplemy u, Malay Pantaw u ngalan niya King Pataw lmawa uri . Ucilung Maryocya u splawa dha Rupun Dapa Ngucun Haywan (Kari Rating: Sinus Sabaricus). Hwajn mi sediq Indu mniq 2 th mi 3 th mniq dxral nniqan hini phiyu ou bay tdruwan asu mawyi mi alang mkbrnux, spuda patas bnatas rikisi Cyokoku u, dhiq 30 ka knou niya. Ddha qnlhangan niyi u niqan knbeyhing bay dndulan niya bungka dxral Malay Pantaw hini. Mniq kongweyn pnrdingan brah th dhuq 14 th pnrdingan, pusu snhiyan dsediq Malay Pataw u Bukyo mi Indukyo mi kluwanan snlhayan snhiyan Indu, tna mniq 4 th cida, dmuwi kari Hwan matas patas. Mniq iyax 7 th dhuq 13 th cida, ou bay nniqan dxral Malay Pantaw u wada danan qmlahang Samboja tikwo, pusu nniqan dha ka Palembang na Sumatra. Wada mowic mtuting ka Srivijaya daw, Madjapahit tikwo ka mniq Jawa ka pusu nniqan dha qmlahang mquri knkana Indunisia mi Malay Pantaw mi Poro co dxral nniqan mkngahu ucilung u niqan balay biyax dndulan dha. Maryocya Wangcaw Snpeyyah Samboja (Kcka Jawa) hwangsu na wangcu Parameswara, pnhiyu Maryocya Sutan Wangcaw, ngalan dha tu1 dukuricu qnlhangan Malay Pantaw. Parameswara na wangcu, Meycya Iskanta wada knpriyux smluhay Islamkyo, kiya mi Maryocya Sutan Wangcaw hnyuwan dha mi biyax seyji dha u wada kndudul swarang ssiyaw qnlhangan ttiping ka Islamkyo, so kiya mniq 15 th daw wada ini biyaw mpusu bay snhiyan sediq Malay ka Islamkyo. Kiya uri u, cida ka Maryocya u wada mqnlangan mi Tunarac Hunac Asia mnrana bay msbari tdruwan asu uri. Oco cmin mi Lmutuc wangcaw Portugal Netherlands Maryocya Diyax mn1 yahan knrmux qmlahang u kngkawas 1511, Portugal cyeyntuy knrmux mangal Maryocya, phiyu dxral qnlhangan dha. Maryocya thiti Sutan Mamusa u qduriq tnqliyan mniq Malay Pantaw mi Kepri, pssli knkingal alang snpusal iyux kntbrinah mangal dxral dha Maryocya mi ini pndungus, hiti balay daw wada mrdang Gamba Sumatra, dha ka risaw niya, pskingal phiyu Piri Wangcaw mi Joho Wangcaw, kcka niya u muda qmlahang Tuhunac Malay Pantaw ka Joho mi kiya ka pusu bay mslutuc muda knciyuk mdakar Portugal. Snpeyyah tudaya Sumatra ka Yaci Wangcaw pa mniq Sutaniskanta Muta ka qmlahang u, prading mniq tudaya Malay Pantaw pkrana tndxral dha, kiya ka knkana Piri, Cida. Kngkawas 1619 cida, wada dha ptqliyan qmraq Yaci ka Maryocya wangsu Ponghng Sutan Amaytsa. Portugal, Joho mi Yaci tu3 biyax mniq diyax iyax niyi cida u mnsupu mccbu, kiya u biyax mpqlahang Ponghng ka smpusal pquri bawa tu3 niyi. Kngkawas 1629 cida, Portugal u msupu Joho wada smliq kana bay asu mcbu Yaci, kiya ka wada lwaqun Malay Pantaw. Binaw Yaci u ida malu mniq kawas cida tbrinah cnbu Cida, kiya mi qrapan ptqliyan dha Yaci ka sediq Cida. Mrdang ka Iskanta Muta daw, risaw tnswayi niya Iskantatani ka rmirih mbukung Yaci Sutan. Diyax qlhangan Ingkoku diyax cida MnIngkoku Malay Pantaw Biyax Ingkoku u mniq kngkawas 1785 daw prading mtmay Malay Pantaw, kngkawas cida Ingkoku Tunarac Indu Kojyo mquri Cida knbarux Pincng. Ini kbsiyaq, quri so Ingkoku u spuda mqbling smatang mkmangal Pincng. Kngkawas 1819 dungan u prading spuda Joho knrmux mangal biyax qmlahang Singapore, ppnsung biyax quri Netherlands. Kngkawas 1824 cida, Ingkoku mi Portugal u ppatas kngkawas 1824 Pnsdhuwan Ingkoku Portugal, thiti balay daw wada smhdu Ingkoku knrmux mangal biyax qmlahang dxral Malayya, mlatac Maryocya ka Netherlands mi malix kana rrihan dha Malayya, kiya mi Ingkoku u smruwa Netherlands mquri Tunarac Indu msngari dxral nniqan rrihan dha. Joho Wangcaw u snpeyyah niyi daw wada mddha uri da, tuhunac Singapore na Riau u wada ngalun biyax qnlhangan Netherlands, wada snchaya Riau Wangcaw. Kngkawas 1826, Ingkoku cmin seyhu u wada dha pspuwan kingal dxral qnlhangan nganguc Ingkoku ka Pincng, Maryocya mi Singapore, hangan niya u Haysya Cminti. Mniq 19 th tubukuy, alaw Malay Pantaw mrrudu ka kcka knkingal wangcaw, wada dndulan ka quri aangal cweyn simi, Ingkoku u prading mbiyax bay tumal prrudu uuda knkingal wangcaw. Mnuda mccbu kcka dha nanaq ka Ponghng, Sweylanwo, Piri mi Snmeyran kndudul smruwa snkulan na cancngsu Ingkoku, duma dmuwi hangan miyah dmayaw Malay dmudul qmlahang uuda qnlhangan, balay bay u sediq rmirih Ingkoku dniyi u wada ini biyaw balay bay mndungus bay qmlahang mnIngkoku Poroco mi Sarawey Wangkwo. Tumn2 qnlangan mccbu mi babaw mccbu dukuricu undo Malayya Ryeynpang u pnhiyu kngkawas 1946, kngkawas 1948 ka wada ptalax. Malayya ryeynhpang ka wada rmirih niya, mniq qnlhangan truma Ingkoku, sbrnahun Dungan ka Qnlhangan Malay Sutan txtaxa qqmlahang niya dmuwi biya qmlahang dhiya nanaq. Mntna diyax niyi, Malayya kyosangto u mbiyax bay dmudul knciyuk yahan qmlahang qnlhangan icil, pdudul ini qpah qpahun, pdudul bheytur muyas na undo, wada so kndudul mtali bay ka pnluban dha Ingkoku. Wada kndudul mrana ka ptraqil mi mtdiyal, hiti bay daw wada pusa kari ka Ingkoku u ngalan dha naqah pnssliyan ka Makong mi prading qmraq dhiya, Makong u wada knpriyux dmuwi ppuniq knciyuk, pdudul uuda yocituy, smatang dha qdriqun platac Malayya ka biyax Ingkoku. Kiya mi Knkana Malayya u mtmay tbyaxun bay ddaun, kndadax kngkawas 1948 dhuq kngkawas 1960, kiya mi niqan heytay Ta Ingkwosyey u tnpusa qmlahang Malayya, muda hmtur yocituy mccbu. Mtdiyal iyax cida, anjeyn butayi pa wada phuqil 6,710 hiyi jnmin cyeyhwangcyu yocituy, wada qrapun ka 1,287 hiyi yocituy, ya bay 3,200 hiyi yocituy ka tosyang. 1,345 hiyi heytay mi keysacu Malayya ka wada mrdang kcka mnccbu. Ta Ingwkosyey na butayi u niqan 519 hiyi mrdang. 2,478 hiyi sediq tnualang ka wada phqilun, 810 hiyi sediq tnualang u wada mrdang ini sndali. Dukuricu phiyu qnlhangan dhuq saya Taykaytang pssli ryeynmong, kiya mi hbaraw balay nniqan kcka tnualang seyngkyo u wada mbiyax, hiti balay daw mniq kngkawas 1955 ka Malayya Ryeynhpang Rihwahuy u mniq kcka mnwaya muda seyngkyo u wada mangal ou bay hiyi giying, kiya mi sosi bucyo Tongku Abuturaman ka mpdudul mi prading smquri Ingcu seyhu dmudul dukuricu. Mniq kngkawas 1957 idas 8 diyax 31 mniq Ingkoko dxral qnlhangan seyhu ka smruwa, wada pusa kari pkla kari dukuricu ka Malayya Ryeynhpang, mntna kngkawas , dmuwi cyucu phiyu keyngpo ryeynpang phiyu kingal burah qnlhangan. So kiya, Tongku Abuturamam ka wada dha ngalan kohu Malaysia (Cida u splawa dha Malayya han) ka Tongku Abuturaman, mntna kngkawas cida u wada phyuwan tu1 congri. Kngkawas 1965, kwohuy Malaysia u wada smruwa puda kana, plwaqan dha Malaysia ka Singapore, wada pkiran dukuricu ka Singapore. Wada mkala mqraqil niyi ka Malaysia, wada mkala sntrngan mptdiyal ka Indunisia mi Malaysia, binaw kcka dha ka ini ptbalay mi dhuq mniq kngkawas 1969 wada ini baka ka cucng ryeynmong, lmutuc hiya pspuruq ka mtdiyal ka minjoku 513 jikeyng. Wada mtmay so mtali sntrngan ka Malaysia, kndusan seyji mi kntrawah u wada htranan uri. Kndadax kngkawas 1970 prading, spuda Utong ka pusu cucng ryeynmong mniq tumn2 congri Atu Rasa ka dmudul cida, alaw iyux muda dmudul kmdhu seyhu, bnbil mniq seyngkyo burah mtutuy na hantaytang, mray so Mincngtang, Piricinputang, Hwanma Huycyawtang ka tumal ryeynmong, knpriyux pnsliyan Kwomin Cnseyng (Kwocn), kiya mi babaw niyi na kcka 44 kngkawas qnbsyaqan dmuwi biyax qmlahang, wada balay so mumurux bay pnwaya tang ka Malaysia. Cng-c Pnwaya seyhu Pyeynsing ka 1 kluwan mniq Malaysia sduwi dha pnwaya pcahu pkdira qnquwan uuda sediq. Malaysia singsu susong tu286 dhuq tu291 syang ka pntura bay matas malu mquri hmrinas 10 kngkawas mi ini khrinas 50 kngkawas na mbiyax hiyi snaw mrahuq smliq pheybun qridin dmuwi taysing (Hniti pnsltudan Ingkoku), kiya mi so rudan sediq u knou bay pncahu u 24 snebuc, ini ttuku 18 kngkawas ka rrisaw u knou bay pncahu ka 10 snbtan, kiya mi naqah psnakan muda snbuc. Mniq Malaysia pyeynsing pkdranun ka sediq pa uxay wana mnuda knbeyhing qnquwan nuda, binaw pyeynsing pusu bay pkdranun niya ka sediq qnquwan nuda mnkan iyu doku, mrahuq smliq pheybun qridin mi smliq waya knrmux tnuayus qnhlangan dha. Binaw hbaraw bay sediq qnhlangan icil u uka brahan dhuq lmngelung uuda mchdil bay pnwaya pcahu niyi, seyhu Malaysia mi hbaraw bay sediq Malaysia qnita dha u, mchdil bay pnwaya pcahu pa malu muda hmtur qnquwan nuda mi smliq qnnaqah uuda. Mnknou bay pnqtan waru ka "Malaysia taysing" kcka llbu eyga u, dmudul 8000 hiyi ryusu Malaysia meysa seyhu malix pnwaya taysing. Cyun-s Malaysia ucwang butay ngalan hangan pusu bay bukung ka tubeyhing bay weynso Malaysia ; dmudul kana Heytay mtucilung, mtelu, mtkarac. Pusu bay qpahun uuda heytay u niqan 5 qnhlangan msupu qmlahang mi UN weyhe singtong, butayi u mntumal Mccbu Afghan dmayaw heytay Amirika mcbu pnsliyan citi mi Taripan cngcweyn, kiya uri u tumal qnburang txtaxa msntali bay pnsliyan Islam uri ka butay dha. Ti-ri Tu43 knkana qnlangan knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka Malaysia, tu68 knkana qnlhangan knrbangan ka tndxral dha, knhbrawan hiyi sediq u 3,170, knrbangan tndxral u 329,847 pihwang km. Wa mniq tudaya cutaw, weytu u wa mniq iyax peywey 1˚ seyng dhuq 8˚ seyng (Niqan tutiping dxral nniqan ka mniq turahuc 1˚), cingtu u wa mniq iyax tunarac cing 99˚ dhuq tongcing 99˚ seyng dhuq tongcing 120˚. Pusu balay u pnspuwan Tunarac Ma mi Tuiwil Ma (Malaysia Pataw) ka Malaysia, wa mniq kcka ka Ucilung Tuhunac. Dxral dha Tuiwil Ma tudaya u mslutuc qnlhangan Thailand, kiya mi mslutuc Tunarac Ma na Brunei mi Indonesia. Kiya u msupu tuhunac na Singapore muda Ucilung Joho mslutuc, tnucilung dha u mslutuc Vietnam mi Philippines. Tnuayu dxral saya u wada ptura bay psdhu, kiya u muru lnlingay nniqan muda ptuayus, kncka u kiya ka knkana yayung alang mkbrnux Wawi mi yayung Kre (Golok River). Malaysia u niqan biyax dha qmlahang duma tawyu Ucilung Tuhunac, mray so Tanwancyaw u dhiya ka dmuwi biyax qmlahang, binaw tuayus quri ucilung daw ida niqan pprngawan dha nina. Malaysia ka murux balay to bay qnlhangan niqan dnuwi dha biyax qmlahang Asia Taru mi Malaysia Cyuntaw, wa mniq Joho co tuhunac Pncn keyng Tanjongpiay ka putting bay hiti Asia Taru. Jn-ko Sediq Malay ka knkan 56%, Hwajn ka 23%, Sediq Tnpusu ka 11%, sediq India ka 7%. Spuda bntasan keyngpo pa, sediq Malay ka muru uuda waya Malay (Waya lnhaya) na Muslim. Mniq seyji ka dhiya u niqan balay biyax dha dmudul. Hnyuwan Sediq Tnpusu u sbuway duma uxay sediq Malay na Sediq Tnpusu uri, kiya ka knkana sediq Thai, sediq Khmer, Cham joku mi Sabah mi Sarawak na Sediq Tnpusu. Uxay Malay Sediq Tnpusu mniq Sarawak u hmrinas knkana knhbrawan hiyi sediq, mniq Sabah u hmrinas 2/3 hiyi sediq. Pantaw u niqan ini khbaraw hiyi ka Sediq Tnpusu, mniq hiya u splawa dha Orang Asli. Quri so ima ka psdhuwan hnyuwan Sediq Tnpusu u ini pntna kana ka pnwaya knkingal co. Cung-cyaw Kengpo Malaysia u qmlahang balay mtrawah ssnhiyan, binaw psdhuwan dha snhiyan qnlhanganka Islamkyo (Muslim) Syunnipay. Spuda patas smnepu kngkawas 2010 knhbrawan hiyi sediq mi sapah , ya bay 61.3% hiyi sediq ka smluhay snhiyan Islamkyo; 19.8% hiyi sediq ka smluhay snhiyan Bukyo; 9.1% hiyi sediq ka smluhay snhiyan Kiristokyo; 6.3% hiyi sediq ka smluhay snhiyan Indiakyo; 1.3% hiyi sediq ka smluhay snhiyan Jucya, Tawkyo mi snhiyan pnsltudan Hwajn mincyeyn congcyaw. Duma sediq ka knkana kluwanan smluhay snhiyan, kiya ka knkana Hwanringrwen, Mincyeyncongcyaw mi Sikekyo; kiya mi 1.1% hiyi sediq ka uka. Wun-hwa Malaysia u pnspuwan knhbaraw bay kluwanan minjoku, knou bay kluwanan bungka mi kari syakay. Mwaya bay bungka ka snpeyyah tndxral Sediq Tnpusu hiya, bukuy daw miyah thdil hini ka sediq Malay. Cyoka bungka mi bungka India ka niqan bay dnlulan niya, malu snolun dhuq qnlhangan icil mawyi prading pplaq balay mniq nniqan dxral hini cida. Quri so knbeyhing bay dndulan niya bungka Malaysia ka bungka snpeyyah qnlhangan icil, kiya ka knkana bungka Posu, Arapo mi Ingkoku. Alaw quri seyji cyeyko seyhu, malan ka so pprngawan ppsdhu syakay, quri so ini khbaraw joku u wada danan muru tikuh ini pntna bungka. Kngkawas 1971 cida u, wada phiyu kingal 'Qnlhangan Bungka Cngce'. Quri so cngce niyi u wada psdhu bungka Malay, pusu na balay u muda phiyu waya bungka Sediq Tnpusu Malaysia, ya balay ka knkana mndungus na so duma kkluwanan bungka uri, kiya mi Islamkyo u kasi ka ppwaluk balay dmudul bungka Malaysia. Cngce niyi u wada dmudul hniwan kari Malay u mkala quri hniwan kari icil. Seyhu ka tumal dmudul quri bungka, maku so ini qqaras ka uxay sediq Malay, lnglungan dha u wada htranan stkuhan qmita ka jiyu bungka dha, qnpringan pnssliyan Hwajn mi sediq India u muda pusa kari ppatas peywangru, tmiyu seyhu u pnwaya kingal ini pnlngu mincu na bungka cngce. Yisu inggaku Pnsltudan yisu Malaysia, pusu na balay u quri snquri, tminun, qqiya ging. Qusi so knkana pnsltudan Yisu u, butun puting Malay, lubuy sbiki, tinun rncuhan rasoku. Klaun bay kana sediq u ubungdqras smnalu qhuni Sediq Tnpusu Tunarac Malaysia. Txtaxa minjoku u niqan tukubeycu ini pntna yisu pyawyeyn kana, ini ptturu kana ka txtaxa dha. Binaw, Malay yisu u balay bay wisu ptura balay wada runun dndulan bungka tudaya India, alaw niyi u dndulan rikisi India. Wenswey Malaysia u niqan mdhu bay pnsltudan quri tnkari, kndadax ini awah ka bbatas ji brah cidaa daw tnaniqan da, ida lmutuc dhuq saya. Knkingal qnlhangan Malay Sutan u wada phiyu pnsltudan wenswey dha nanaq, wada dndulan cbiyaw ida niqan ka pnngalan kari mi lmutuc srwarang hiya ka pnngalan kari Islam. Hwajn mi India wenswey u spuda nanaq knhbrawan hiyi dha mniq Malaysia mi kndudul mrana qtan balay uri, kiya mi kndadax 19 th prading,prading niqan ka patas bntasan ji Hwawen mi ji India dxral nniqan hiya, eygo uri ka qtan bay wenswey mi kari. Prading niqan kikay insacu ka pusu na balay uri, so kiya u knhbrawan bay sediq ka malu qmita bnatas wenswey, to bay bnatas bawa kana ka weyswey cuxal han, niqan pila sediq ka dhuq mari. So kiya, mkla eygo ka Malay hwangjoku, kiya mi wana mkla smpu ji Malay ka kcka mi llbu cyeycng u ida niqan kingal tnayus niya. Kngkawas 1971 cida, seyhu ka muda dmudul uuda, wada pdudul ini pntna kari wenswey. Mchiya uuqun Mchiya uuqun Malaysia pa ptura quri so pnspuwan knou ini pntna minjoku dha. Snpeyyah tnayuc kcka knlhangan mi ssiyaw dxral nniqan dha u knou bay ini pntana bungka, niqan knbeyhing bay dndulan niya mchiya uuqun. Knbeyhing bay biyax dmudul niya ka sediq Malay, Hwajn, India, Thailand, Jawa mi Sumatra na bungka, to bay so nniqan qnlhangan dha u wa mniq ddaun elu ncbiyaw malu knux mawyi. Mchiya uuqun Malaysia mi Singapore mi Brunei u mntna balay, kiya mi mntna balay mchiya uuqun Philippines uri. Singapore u quri so Cawco mi sediq Holo ka pusu niya, so kiya u aji uuqun dha u mquri so Cawco mi Hudyeyn uqun; qori so Tama u, kiya mquri Holo, Kwangtong, sediq Hakka ka pusu, kiya mi niqan ka sediq Kwangsi mi sediq Huco uri, so kiya aji uuqun dha u pndungus balay kiya, ini pntna ka nniqan co u niqan ini pntna kluwan damac, kiya mi uuqun mniq Malaysia pa ini pntna damac pusu pnyahan niya. Diyax sngayan mi smsung Qnlhangan pnspuwan knou bay kluwanan minjoku ka Malaysia, sediq Malaysia kingal kngkawas u muda smqaras smsung ou bay diyax sngayan mi uuda smsung. Duma diyax smsung ka snpeyyah Ryeynpang syeynpaw pkla pspuwan diyax sngayan, duma u spuda txtaxa cosu muda pkla ka pspuwan diyax sngayan. Spruwan bay qmita diyax smsung ka kngkawas idas 8 diyax 31 diyax smsung Dukuricu, muda dmahur lmlung kngkawas 1963 idas 9 diyax 16 pnspuwan Malayya Ryeynpang, Sabah, Sarawak mi Singapore phiyu kingal burah qnlhangan (Singapore u wada mniq kngkawas 1965 ka mlatac). Smsung Rawtong (idas 5 diyax 1), Pntinga knbeyhing bay bukung weynso (idas 6 tu1 diyax sngayan tu6 diyax) mi knkingal co Sutan/Knbeyhing bay mqlahang/Raje/Pntingan Co weynso uri ka spruwan qmita diyax, alaw tu3 diyax niyi ka pnwaya diyax sngayan knkana qnlhangan Malaysia. Pnspuwan diyax sngayan Malaysia u niqan Nongri Smsung Burah Kngkawas, Smsung Kaycaya, Smsung Smipah Utux Naqah, Smsung Mqaras Pntingan Yesu. Alaw Islamkyo ka Malaysia tu3 knbeyhing snhiyan uri, so kiya, pusu diyax smsung Muslim u pspuwan diyax sngayan kana uri, mray so Smsung Kaycay (Hari Raya Puasa或Hari Raya Aidilfitri), Smsung Haci (Hari Raya Aidiladha), Smsung Huyri Weyntan , Smsung Pntingan Krancing mi Smsung Pntingan Muhammad.

= Malaysia = Gaga kska Yacow ka Malaysia, 2 30 N, 112 30 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 330,803 sq km(hangan na o Tg67) (knlbanga dxgal o 329,613 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 1,190 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 30,949,962 hiyi. Gaga Koala Lompor ka poso alang paro, jiyax 31 idas 8 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Malaysia ga wada sogan 23.20% ka dxgal qpahan, 62% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 14.80% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Yang di-Pertoan Agong, pnaah hngkawas2016 idas 12 jiyax 31pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Malaysia Malaysia (Skari Malaysia, Eygo: Malaysia; lxan splawa ka Tama) kiya ka qnlhangan wa mniq Tonarac honac Asia. Snpeyyah brah Malaysia Ryeynpang, Todaya Poroco, Sarawey mi Singapore o mniq kngkawas 1963 idas 9 diyax 16 pnspowan ka pnwaya ryeynpang, pnwaya gikay minco, seyngkyo pnwaya cyonco mi qnlhangan pnwaya cyonco phiyo keyngpo, hiti daw Singapore co o mniq kngkawas 1965 idas 8 diyax 9 cida o wada plixan hangan ryeynpang, kiya o wada morox dokorico phiyo qnlhangan. Weynso qnlhangan Malaysia ka splawa dha knbaraw bay weynso, snpeyyah pnrngawan Malay mpqlahang moda omao. Kiya mi seyho o snpeyyah mnngal knoo bay kokoingkay giying na cngtang mi bokong ryeynmong-congri ka mpdodol niya, seyji tico o moro snpeyyah Ingkoko pnwaya simin. Qori so waycyaw o, Malaysia ka UN kaying, kiya ori o Hwan Indoyang Cyoyo Hcwo Ryeynmong, Pnsliyan Asia Taypingyang Keyjay Hecwo, Ta Ing Kwosyey, Tonarac Honac Asia Qnlhangan Syeyhoy, Ini Pwalok Undo mi Pnsliyan Islam Hoyyi na qnlhangan ntomal, kiya o Tonarac Honac Asia Qnlhangan Syeyhoy mi Pnsliyan Islam kaygi na pnrdingan smmalo phiyo qnlhangan ori. Mnoda qpahon Tonarac Honac Qnlhangan Syeyhoy, Pnsliyan Islam kaygi mi Ini Pwalok Undo cosi, mnoda qpahon UN Anrihoy hoycangjn riji qnhlangan. Ri-s Scyeyn sci mi wangcaw cbiyaw Rodah bay cbiyaw mnniq dxral nniqan hini ka sediq pa malao bhrawan smpo dhoq 4 knbkiyan brah cida. Tobrah balay mnniq Malay Pantaw na sediq pa sediq Nikrito, splawa dha llbo sediq qalox. Rodan cbiyaw sediq Indo splawa dha 'King Pataw' (Ji Indo: Sovarnadvipa; Eygo: Golden Peninsola) ka Malay Pataw. Mniq kcka joga qnlangan Ptplemy o, Malay Pantaw o ngalan niya King Pataw lmawa ori . Ucilong Maryocya o splawa dha Ropon Dapa Ngocon Haywan (Kari Rating: Sinos Sabaricos). Hwajn mi sediq Indo mniq 2 th mi 3 th mniq dxral nniqan hini phiyo oo bay tdrowan aso mawyi mi alang mkbrnox, spoda patas bnatas rikisi Cyokoko o, dhiq 30 ka knoo niya. Ddha qnlhangan niyi o niqan knbeyhing bay dndolan niya bongka dxral Malay Pantaw hini. Mniq kongweyn pnrdingan brah th dhoq 14 th pnrdingan, poso snhiyan dsediq Malay Pataw o Bokyo mi Indokyo mi klowanan snlhayan snhiyan Indo, tna mniq 4 th cida, dmowi kari Hwan matas patas. Mniq iyax 7 th dhoq 13 th cida, oo bay nniqan dxral Malay Pantaw o wada danan qmlahang Samboja tikwo, poso nniqan dha ka Palembang na Somatra. Wada mowic mtoting ka Srivijaya daw, Madjapahit tikwo ka mniq Jawa ka poso nniqan dha qmlahang mqori knkana Indonisia mi Malay Pantaw mi Poro co dxral nniqan mkngaho ocilong o niqan balay biyax dndolan dha. Maryocya Wangcaw Snpeyyah Samboja (Kcka Jawa) hwangso na wangco Parameswara, pnhiyo Maryocya Sotan Wangcaw, ngalan dha to1 dokorico qnlhangan Malay Pantaw. Parameswara na wangco, Meycya Iskanta wada knpriyox smlohay Islamkyo, kiya mi Maryocya Sotan Wangcaw hnyowan dha mi biyax seyji dha o wada kndodol swarang ssiyaw qnlhangan ttiping ka Islamkyo, so kiya mniq 15 th daw wada ini biyaw mposo bay snhiyan sediq Malay ka Islamkyo. Kiya ori o, cida ka Maryocya o wada mqnlangan mi Tonarac Honac Asia mnrana bay msbari tdrowan aso ori. Oco cmin mi Lmotoc wangcaw Portogal Netherlands Maryocya Diyax mn1 yahan knrmox qmlahang o kngkawas 1511, Portogal cyeyntoy knrmox mangal Maryocya, phiyo dxral qnlhangan dha. Maryocya thiti Sotan Mamosa o qdoriq tnqliyan mniq Malay Pantaw mi Kepri, pssli knkingal alang snposal iyox kntbrinah mangal dxral dha Maryocya mi ini pndongos, hiti balay daw wada mrdang Gamba Somatra, dha ka risaw niya, pskingal phiyo Piri Wangcaw mi Joho Wangcaw, kcka niya o moda qmlahang Tohonac Malay Pantaw ka Joho mi kiya ka poso bay mslotoc moda knciyok mdakar Portogal. Snpeyyah todaya Somatra ka Yaci Wangcaw pa mniq Sotaniskanta Mota ka qmlahang o, prading mniq todaya Malay Pantaw pkrana tndxral dha, kiya ka knkana Piri, Cida. Kngkawas 1619 cida, wada dha ptqliyan qmraq Yaci ka Maryocya wangso Ponghng Sotan Amaytsa. Portogal, Joho mi Yaci to3 biyax mniq diyax iyax niyi cida o mnsopo mccbo, kiya o biyax mpqlahang Ponghng ka smposal pqori bawa to3 niyi. Kngkawas 1629 cida, Portogal o msopo Joho wada smliq kana bay aso mcbo Yaci, kiya ka wada lwaqon Malay Pantaw. Binaw Yaci o ida malo mniq kawas cida tbrinah cnbo Cida, kiya mi qrapan ptqliyan dha Yaci ka sediq Cida. Mrdang ka Iskanta Mota daw, risaw tnswayi niya Iskantatani ka rmirih mbokong Yaci Sotan. Diyax qlhangan Ingkoko diyax cida MnIngkoko Malay Pantaw Biyax Ingkoko o mniq kngkawas 1785 daw prading mtmay Malay Pantaw, kngkawas cida Ingkoko Tonarac Indo Kojyo mqori Cida knbarox Pincng. Ini kbsiyaq, qori so Ingkoko o spoda mqbling smatang mkmangal Pincng. Kngkawas 1819 dongan o prading spoda Joho knrmox mangal biyax qmlahang Singapore, ppnsong biyax qori Netherlands. Kngkawas 1824 cida, Ingkoko mi Portogal o ppatas kngkawas 1824 Pnsdhowan Ingkoko Portogal, thiti balay daw wada smhdo Ingkoko knrmox mangal biyax qmlahang dxral Malayya, mlatac Maryocya ka Netherlands mi malix kana rrihan dha Malayya, kiya mi Ingkoko o smrowa Netherlands mqori Tonarac Indo msngari dxral nniqan rrihan dha. Joho Wangcaw o snpeyyah niyi daw wada mddha ori da, tohonac Singapore na Riao o wada ngalon biyax qnlhangan Netherlands, wada snchaya Riao Wangcaw. Kngkawas 1826, Ingkoko cmin seyho o wada dha pspowan kingal dxral qnlhangan ngangoc Ingkoko ka Pincng, Maryocya mi Singapore, hangan niya o Haysya Cminti. Mniq 19 th tobokoy, alaw Malay Pantaw mrrodo ka kcka knkingal wangcaw, wada dndolan ka qori aangal cweyn simi, Ingkoko o prading mbiyax bay tomal prrodo ooda knkingal wangcaw. Mnoda mccbo kcka dha nanaq ka Ponghng, Sweylanwo, Piri mi Snmeyran kndodol smrowa snkolan na cancngso Ingkoko, doma dmowi hangan miyah dmayaw Malay dmodol qmlahang ooda qnlhangan, balay bay o sediq rmirih Ingkoko dniyi o wada ini biyaw balay bay mndongos bay qmlahang mnIngkoko Poroco mi Sarawey Wangkwo. Tomn2 qnlangan mccbo mi babaw mccbo dokorico ondo Malayya Ryeynpang o pnhiyo kngkawas 1946, kngkawas 1948 ka wada ptalax. Malayya ryeynhpang ka wada rmirih niya, mniq qnlhangan troma Ingkoko, sbrnahon Dongan ka Qnlhangan Malay Sotan txtaxa qqmlahang niya dmowi biya qmlahang dhiya nanaq. Mntna diyax niyi, Malayya kyosangto o mbiyax bay dmodol knciyok yahan qmlahang qnlhangan icil, pdodol ini qpah qpahon, pdodol bheytor moyas na ondo, wada so kndodol mtali bay ka pnloban dha Ingkoko. Wada kndodol mrana ka ptraqil mi mtdiyal, hiti bay daw wada posa kari ka Ingkoko o ngalan dha naqah pnssliyan ka Makong mi prading qmraq dhiya, Makong o wada knpriyox dmowi pponiq knciyok, pdodol ooda yocitoy, smatang dha qdriqon platac Malayya ka biyax Ingkoko. Kiya mi Knkana Malayya o mtmay tbyaxon bay ddaon, kndadax kngkawas 1948 dhoq kngkawas 1960, kiya mi niqan heytay Ta Ingkwosyey o tnposa qmlahang Malayya, moda hmtor yocitoy mccbo. Mtdiyal iyax cida, anjeyn botayi pa wada phoqil 6,710 hiyi jnmin cyeyhwangcyo yocitoy, wada qrapon ka 1,287 hiyi yocitoy, ya bay 3,200 hiyi yocitoy ka tosyang. 1,345 hiyi heytay mi keysaco Malayya ka wada mrdang kcka mnccbo. Ta Ingwkosyey na botayi o niqan 519 hiyi mrdang. 2,478 hiyi sediq tnoalang ka wada phqilon, 810 hiyi sediq tnoalang o wada mrdang ini sndali. Dokorico phiyo qnlhangan dhoq saya Taykaytang pssli ryeynmong, kiya mi hbaraw balay nniqan kcka tnoalang seyngkyo o wada mbiyax, hiti balay daw mniq kngkawas 1955 ka Malayya Ryeynhpang Rihwahoy o mniq kcka mnwaya moda seyngkyo o wada mangal oo bay hiyi giying, kiya mi sosi bocyo Tongko Abotoraman ka mpdodol mi prading smqori Ingco seyho dmodol dokorico. Mniq kngkawas 1957 idas 8 diyax 31 mniq Ingkoko dxral qnlhangan seyho ka smrowa, wada posa kari pkla kari dokorico ka Malayya Ryeynhpang, mntna kngkawas , dmowi cyoco phiyo keyngpo ryeynpang phiyo kingal borah qnlhangan. So kiya, Tongko Abotoramam ka wada dha ngalan koho Malaysia (Cida o splawa dha Malayya han) ka Tongko Abotoraman, mntna kngkawas cida o wada phyowan to1 congri. Kngkawas 1965, kwohoy Malaysia o wada smrowa poda kana, plwaqan dha Malaysia ka Singapore, wada pkiran dokorico ka Singapore. Wada mkala mqraqil niyi ka Malaysia, wada mkala sntrngan mptdiyal ka Indonisia mi Malaysia, binaw kcka dha ka ini ptbalay mi dhoq mniq kngkawas 1969 wada ini baka ka cocng ryeynmong, lmotoc hiya psporoq ka mtdiyal ka minjoko 513 jikeyng. Wada mtmay so mtali sntrngan ka Malaysia, kndosan seyji mi kntrawah o wada htranan ori. Kndadax kngkawas 1970 prading, spoda Utong ka poso cocng ryeynmong mniq tomn2 congri Ato Rasa ka dmodol cida, alaw iyox moda dmodol kmdho seyho, bnbil mniq seyngkyo borah mtotoy na hantaytang, mray so Mincngtang, Piricinpotang, Hwanma Hoycyawtang ka tomal ryeynmong, knpriyox pnsliyan Kwomin Cnseyng (Kwocn), kiya mi babaw niyi na kcka 44 kngkawas qnbsyaqan dmowi biyax qmlahang, wada balay so momorox bay pnwaya tang ka Malaysia. Cng-c Pnwaya seyho Pyeynsing ka 1 klowan mniq Malaysia sdowi dha pnwaya pcaho pkdira qnqowan ooda sediq. Malaysia singso sosong to286 dhoq to291 syang ka pntora bay matas malo mqori hmrinas 10 kngkawas mi ini khrinas 50 kngkawas na mbiyax hiyi snaw mrahoq smliq pheybon qridin dmowi taysing (Hniti pnsltodan Ingkoko), kiya mi so rodan sediq o knoo bay pncaho o 24 sneboc, ini ttoko 18 kngkawas ka rrisaw o knoo bay pncaho ka 10 snbtan, kiya mi naqah psnakan moda snboc. Mniq Malaysia pyeynsing pkdranon ka sediq pa oxay wana mnoda knbeyhing qnqowan noda, binaw pyeynsing poso bay pkdranon niya ka sediq qnqowan noda mnkan iyo doko, mrahoq smliq pheybon qridin mi smliq waya knrmox tnoayos qnhlangan dha. Binaw hbaraw bay sediq qnhlangan icil o oka brahan dhoq lmngelong ooda mchdil bay pnwaya pcaho niyi, seyho Malaysia mi hbaraw bay sediq Malaysia qnita dha o, mchdil bay pnwaya pcaho pa malo moda hmtor qnqowan noda mi smliq qnnaqah ooda. Mnknoo bay pnqtan waro ka "Malaysia taysing" kcka llbo eyga o, dmodol 8000 hiyi ryoso Malaysia meysa seyho malix pnwaya taysing. Cyon-s Malaysia ocwang botay ngalan hangan poso bay bokong ka tobeyhing bay weynso Malaysia ; dmodol kana Heytay mtocilong, mtelo, mtkarac. Poso bay qpahon ooda heytay o niqan 5 qnhlangan msopo qmlahang mi UN weyhe singtong, botayi o mntomal Mccbo Afghan dmayaw heytay Amirika mcbo pnsliyan citi mi Taripan cngcweyn, kiya ori o tomal qnborang txtaxa msntali bay pnsliyan Islam ori ka botay dha. Ti-ri To43 knkana qnlangan knhbrawan hiyi sediq ka Malaysia, to68 knkana qnlhangan knrbangan ka tndxral dha, knhbrawan hiyi sediq o 3,170, knrbangan tndxral o 329,847 pihwang km. Wa mniq todaya cotaw, weyto o wa mniq iyax peywey 1˚ seyng dhoq 8˚ seyng (Niqan totiping dxral nniqan ka mniq torahoc 1˚), cingto o wa mniq iyax tonarac cing 99˚ dhoq tongcing 99˚ seyng dhoq tongcing 120˚. Poso balay o pnspowan Tonarac Ma mi Toiwil Ma (Malaysia Pataw) ka Malaysia, wa mniq kcka ka Ucilong Tohonac. Dxral dha Toiwil Ma todaya o mslotoc qnlhangan Thailand, kiya mi mslotoc Tonarac Ma na Bronei mi Indonesia. Kiya o msopo tohonac na Singapore moda Ucilong Joho mslotoc, tnocilong dha o mslotoc Vietnam mi Philippines. Tnoayo dxral saya o wada ptora bay psdho, kiya o moro lnlingay nniqan moda ptoayos, kncka o kiya ka knkana yayong alang mkbrnox Wawi mi yayong Kre (Golok River). Malaysia o niqan biyax dha qmlahang doma tawyo Ucilong Tohonac, mray so Tanwancyaw o dhiya ka dmowi biyax qmlahang, binaw toayos qori ocilong daw ida niqan pprngawan dha nina. Malaysia ka morox balay to bay qnlhangan niqan dnowi dha biyax qmlahang Asia Taro mi Malaysia Cyontaw, wa mniq Joho co tohonac Pncn keyng Tanjongpiay ka potting bay hiti Asia Taro. Jn-ko Sediq Malay ka knkan 56%, Hwajn ka 23%, Sediq Tnposo ka 11%, sediq India ka 7%. Spoda bntasan keyngpo pa, sediq Malay ka moro ooda waya Malay (Waya lnhaya) na Moslim. Mniq seyji ka dhiya o niqan balay biyax dha dmodol. Hnyowan Sediq Tnposo o sboway doma oxay sediq Malay na Sediq Tnposo ori, kiya ka knkana sediq Thai, sediq Khmer, Cham joko mi Sabah mi Sarawak na Sediq Tnposo. Uxay Malay Sediq Tnposo mniq Sarawak o hmrinas knkana knhbrawan hiyi sediq, mniq Sabah o hmrinas 2/3 hiyi sediq. Pantaw o niqan ini khbaraw hiyi ka Sediq Tnposo, mniq hiya o splawa dha Orang Asli. Qori so ima ka psdhowan hnyowan Sediq Tnposo o ini pntna kana ka pnwaya knkingal co. Cong-cyaw Kengpo Malaysia o qmlahang balay mtrawah ssnhiyan, binaw psdhowan dha snhiyan qnlhanganka Islamkyo (Moslim) Syonnipay. Spoda patas smnepo kngkawas 2010 knhbrawan hiyi sediq mi sapah , ya bay 61.3% hiyi sediq ka smlohay snhiyan Islamkyo; 19.8% hiyi sediq ka smlohay snhiyan Bokyo; 9.1% hiyi sediq ka smlohay snhiyan Kiristokyo; 6.3% hiyi sediq ka smlohay snhiyan Indiakyo; 1.3% hiyi sediq ka smlohay snhiyan Jocya, Tawkyo mi snhiyan pnsltodan Hwajn mincyeyn congcyaw. Doma sediq ka knkana klowanan smlohay snhiyan, kiya ka knkana Hwanringrwen, Mincyeyncongcyaw mi Sikekyo; kiya mi 1.1% hiyi sediq ka oka. Won-hwa Malaysia o pnspowan knhbaraw bay klowanan minjoko, knoo bay klowanan bongka mi kari syakay. Mwaya bay bongka ka snpeyyah tndxral Sediq Tnposo hiya, bokoy daw miyah thdil hini ka sediq Malay. Cyoka bongka mi bongka India ka niqan bay dnlolan niya, malo snolon dhoq qnlhangan icil mawyi prading pplaq balay mniq nniqan dxral hini cida. Qori so knbeyhing bay dndolan niya bongka Malaysia ka bongka snpeyyah qnlhangan icil, kiya ka knkana bongka Poso, Arapo mi Ingkoko. Alaw qori seyji cyeyko seyho, malan ka so pprngawan ppsdho syakay, qori so ini khbaraw joko o wada danan moro tikoh ini pntna bongka. Kngkawas 1971 cida o, wada phiyo kingal 'Qnlhangan Bongka Cngce'. Qori so cngce niyi o wada psdho bongka Malay, poso na balay o moda phiyo waya bongka Sediq Tnposo Malaysia, ya balay ka knkana mndongos na so doma kklowanan bongka ori, kiya mi Islamkyo o kasi ka ppwalok balay dmodol bongka Malaysia. Cngce niyi o wada dmodol hniwan kari Malay o mkala qori hniwan kari icil. Seyho ka tomal dmodol qori bongka, mako so ini qqaras ka oxay sediq Malay, lnglongan dha o wada htranan stkohan qmita ka jiyo bongka dha, qnpringan pnssliyan Hwajn mi sediq India o moda posa kari ppatas peywangro, tmiyo seyho o pnwaya kingal ini pnlngo minco na bongka cngce. Yiso inggako Pnsltodan yiso Malaysia, poso na balay o qori snqori, tminon, qqiya ging. Qosi so knkana pnsltodan Yiso o, boton poting Malay, loboy sbiki, tinon rncohan rasoko. Klaon bay kana sediq o obongdqras smnalo qhoni Sediq Tnposo Tonarac Malaysia. Txtaxa minjoko o niqan tokobeyco ini pntna yiso pyawyeyn kana, ini pttoro kana ka txtaxa dha. Binaw, Malay yiso o balay bay wiso ptora balay wada ronon dndolan bongka todaya India, alaw niyi o dndolan rikisi India. Wenswey Malaysia o niqan mdho bay pnsltodan qori tnkari, kndadax ini awah ka bbatas ji brah cidaa daw tnaniqan da, ida lmotoc dhoq saya. Knkingal qnlhangan Malay Sotan o wada phiyo pnsltodan wenswey dha nanaq, wada dndolan cbiyaw ida niqan ka pnngalan kari mi lmotoc srwarang hiya ka pnngalan kari Islam. Hwajn mi India wenswey o spoda nanaq knhbrawan hiyi dha mniq Malaysia mi kndodol mrana qtan balay ori, kiya mi kndadax 19 th prading,prading niqan ka patas bntasan ji Hwawen mi ji India dxral nniqan hiya, eygo ori ka qtan bay wenswey mi kari. Prading niqan kikay insaco ka poso na balay ori, so kiya o knhbrawan bay sediq ka malo qmita bnatas wenswey, to bay bnatas bawa kana ka weyswey coxal han, niqan pila sediq ka dhoq mari. So kiya, mkla eygo ka Malay hwangjoko, kiya mi wana mkla smpo ji Malay ka kcka mi llbo cyeycng o ida niqan kingal tnayos niya. Kngkawas 1971 cida, seyho ka moda dmodol ooda, wada pdodol ini pntna kari wenswey. Mchiya ooqon Mchiya ooqon Malaysia pa ptora qori so pnspowan knoo ini pntna minjoko dha. Snpeyyah tnayoc kcka knlhangan mi ssiyaw dxral nniqan dha o knoo bay ini pntana bongka, niqan knbeyhing bay dndolan niya mchiya ooqon. Knbeyhing bay biyax dmodol niya ka sediq Malay, Hwajn, India, Thailand, Jawa mi Somatra na bongka, to bay so nniqan qnlhangan dha o wa mniq ddaon elo ncbiyaw malo knox mawyi. Mchiya ooqon Malaysia mi Singapore mi Bronei o mntna balay, kiya mi mntna balay mchiya ooqon Philippines ori. Singapore o qori so Cawco mi sediq Holo ka poso niya, so kiya o aji ooqon dha o mqori so Cawco mi Hodyeyn oqon; qori so Tama o, kiya mqori Holo, Kwangtong, sediq Hakka ka poso, kiya mi niqan ka sediq Kwangsi mi sediq Hoco ori, so kiya aji ooqon dha o pndongos balay kiya, ini pntna ka nniqan co o niqan ini pntna klowan damac, kiya mi ooqon mniq Malaysia pa ini pntna damac poso pnyahan niya. Diyax sngayan mi smsong Qnlhangan pnspowan knoo bay klowanan minjoko ka Malaysia, sediq Malaysia kingal kngkawas o moda smqaras smsong oo bay diyax sngayan mi ooda smsong. Doma diyax smsong ka snpeyyah Ryeynpang syeynpaw pkla pspowan diyax sngayan, doma o spoda txtaxa coso moda pkla ka pspowan diyax sngayan. Sprowan bay qmita diyax smsong ka kngkawas idas 8 diyax 31 diyax smsong Dokorico, moda dmahor lmlong kngkawas 1963 idas 9 diyax 16 pnspowan Malayya Ryeynpang, Sabah, Sarawak mi Singapore phiyo kingal borah qnlhangan (Singapore o wada mniq kngkawas 1965 ka mlatac). Smsong Rawtong (idas 5 diyax 1), Pntinga knbeyhing bay bokong weynso (idas 6 to1 diyax sngayan to6 diyax) mi knkingal co Sotan/Knbeyhing bay mqlahang/Raje/Pntingan Co weynso ori ka sprowan qmita diyax, alaw to3 diyax niyi ka pnwaya diyax sngayan knkana qnlhangan Malaysia. Pnspowan diyax sngayan Malaysia o niqan Nongri Smsong Borah Kngkawas, Smsong Kaycaya, Smsong Smipah Utox Naqah, Smsong Mqaras Pntingan Yeso. Alaw Islamkyo ka Malaysia to3 knbeyhing snhiyan ori, so kiya, poso diyax smsong Moslim o pspowan diyax sngayan kana ori, mray so Smsong Kaycay (Hari Raya Poasa或Hari Raya Aidilfitri), Smsong Haci (Hari Raya Aidiladha), Smsong Hoyri Weyntan , Smsong Pntingan Krancing mi Smsong Pntingan Mohammad.
